CustomField.description: Displays the full path of the Location including Site, Block, Unit
CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name, 'Block', IF(ISBLANK( Sitename__c), Name__c, Parent_Block__r.Name__c & ' / ' & Name__c), 'Unit', IF(ISBLANK( Sitename__c), Parent_Block__r.Name__c & ' / ' & Name__c, Parent_Block__r.Parent_Block__r.Name__c & ' / ' & Parent_Block__r.Name__c & ' / ' & Name__c), 'Site', Name__c, NULL)
CustomField.label: Full Location Name
